mapper.update: update review set comment1 = #{comment1}, comment2 = #{comment2}, score1 = #{score1}, score2 = #{score2}, score3 = #{score3}, score4 = #{score4}, score5 = #{score5}, reg_date = now() where project_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id} and peer_id = #{peer_id}
mapper.select: select round(avg(total)) as avg from (select * from review where peer_id = #{user_id} and project_no = #{no}) a group by project_no

select peer_id from review where project_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id} and total = (select MAX(total) from review where project_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id}) order by reg_date desc limit 1

select u.name from review r join user u on r.peer_id = u.id where project_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id} and total = (select MAX(total) from review where project_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id}) order by r.reg_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into test(user_id, test, file) values(#{user_id}, #{test}, #{file})
mapper.select: select r.project_no as no, r.user_id, a.peer_id, u.name as peer_name, u.team as peer_team, a.role as peer_role, r.total as score, u.image as peer_image from review r join acceptteam a on r.peer_id = a.peer_id join user u on r.peer_id = u.id where r.user_id = #{user_id} and r.project_no = #{no} and a.no = #{no}
